message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start the negotiation.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $15,000 to purchase the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is closer to its true value.  Would you be willing to meet me at $16,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the reduction, I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $15,000.
